title: Carol Vorderman stuns in ultra-clinging silver gown with very daring slit
text:

Carol Vorderman got a hole in one with this clinging dress as she partied at a golf resort.

The 58-year-old pilot / mathematician / all round brainiac had fans begging to be her caddie after she shared two sizzling snaps on Twitter .

Opting for an off the shoulder floor-length John Charles gown with daring slit, Carol looked simply stunning as she kept her highlighted hair naturally wavy.

She captioned the two sanps: ":A good night with @ValeResortGolf, #Cardiff..Should be technically dead after all work & travel over last month, but I'm raring to go....radio show this lunchtime...then off to JAPAN."

(Image: @carolvorders /Twitter)

Twitter was quick to notice the snap, especially the fetching off the shoulder pose which showed off the mum-of-one's famous "rear of the year".

One fan gushed: "Looking FAB, have a great trip , not jealous at all said no one ever."

Another added: "Carol You look amazing! You get better with age."

(Image: @carolvorders /Twitter)

(Image: www.rearoftheyearcompetition.com)

It comes as Amanda Holden revealed she was a huge fan of Carol's bum as she scooped the award Rear Of The Year.

Responding to Amanda’s comments, Carol wrote: “Got to love you @AmandaHolden for this…”

She then added the hashtag: “#BouncingButts.”

The presenter, who hosts her own programme on BBC Radio Wales every Saturday, is expected to jet out of the UK later today.
description: Carol Vorderman's long silver gown left very little to the imagination as she flashed her gorgeous pins
